channel.title: Where Can I Find MoparClassic's Source?
channel.description:
Hi there, I've been reading about what people think is the best source and apparently 'Moparclassic' is the best. However... I can't seem to find a download for it and I've searched the forums multiple times.
If you can think of a better source to work with then please let me know and link to a download.
P.S All of the threads for sources contain broken links only, I think EasyRSC is the only displayed source around.

item.title: Where Can I Find MoparClassic's Source?
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

[quote=“Reaper_NZ, post:3, topic:455734”]Sweet man, thanks. I guess I should just take this quick moment to ask where most sources are shared these days?
It’s just that Google only turns up old results and the forum searches show nothing so it seems it’s going underground?[/quote]
Most links just expire and few sources are on sourcerepos just ask if you want a source you can’t find.

Read full topic
item.source: Where Can I Find MoparClassic's Source?
